html:
{{t:cta_headline}}

{{t:cta_subheadline}}

{{t:cta_button_primary}}
css: .section-cta-centered-bold-8m { padding: 100px 0; text-align: center; background-color: var(--color-light); }.section-cta-centered-bold-8m .container { }.section-cta-centered-bold-8m .cta-content-wrapper { max-width: 700px; margin: 0 auto; }.section-cta-centered-bold-8m .cta-title { font-size: clamp(2.5rem, 6vw, 4rem); font-family: var(--font-heading); color: var(--color-dark); margin-bottom: 20px; line-height: 1.2; }.section-cta-centered-bold-8m .cta-text { font-size: 1.2rem; color: var(--color-secondary); margin-bottom: 40px; line-height: 1.6; }.section-cta-centered-bold-8m .cta-button { display: inline-block; padding: 18px 40px; background-color: var(--color-primary); color: var(--color-light); text-decoration: none; border-radius: 50px; font-weight: bold; font-size: 1.1rem; transition: all 0.3s ease; border: 2px solid var(--color-primary); }.section-cta-centered-bold-8m .cta-button:hover { background-color: transparent; color: var(--color-primary); }.section-cta-centered-bold-8m .container { padding: 0 20px; }

en.cta_subheadline: Discover the future of AI-powered creativity. Get started today.

ar.cta_subheadline: اكتشف مستقبل الإبداع المدعوم بالذكاء الاصطناعي. ابدأ اليوم.

de.cta_subheadline: Entdecken Sie die Zukunft KI-gestützter Kreativität. Starten Sie noch heute.
